Case Title: Delhi Metro Rail Corporation Ltd. Vs Delhi Airport Metro Express Pvt. Ltd.
Issue for Consideration: Issue for Consideration (i) Whether the curative petition is maintainable; and (ii) Whether this Court (two-judge Bench) was justified in restoring had been set aside by the Division Bench of the High Court on the ground that it suffered from patently illegality.
